article.title: apex legends season update
article.excerpt: apex legends is expecting a new huge updates with new skins and tradable market No matter whether in real life, playing a game, or trading with others, one of the main concerns that most people have is safety. When trading in a marketplace, traders feel safer and are given more options by being able to browse through similar offers by different sellers, making a judgement for themselves on who they want to trade with, or what they want to buy. They are also able to review previous feedback for others created after historical transactions, meaning that every seller has a feedback score that gives buyers an indication of what trading with them is like.
